articles.author: Pathom Sangwongwanich
articles.title: XBB.1.5 Thailand Travel Border Rules: Latest Update on Foreigners - Bloomberg
articles.description: Thailand will reintroduce Covid-19 entry requirements for foreigners flying into the country from Monday, the nation’s transport minister said, as the Southeast Asian nation prepares for an expected wave of tourists from China.

articles.title: 'More the merrier': Asia tourist hubs ready for China influx - The Straits Times
articles.description:
From Sunday, travellers arriving back in China will no longer need to quarantine.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
TOKYO - In Tokyos Asakusa tourist district, caricaturist Masashi Higashitani is dusting off his Chinese as he prepares for an influx of travellers after Beijing ends inbound quarantine rules.
